tier.item: (13) Mattila-n Eero ampui sonni-n ja Kaurase-n Jari pien-ta, vain 115 kiloi-sta
Mattila-Gen Eero.Nom shot bull-Acc and Kauranen-Gen Jari small-Part only 115 kilo-Adj-Part
`Eero Mattila shot [and killed] a bull elk and Jari Kauranen shot a small cow which only
weighed 115 kilo and which Kalevi then finished off.'
